title: Namma Yatri - Ride Booking App
description:
🛺 India’s Mobility Revolution. Powered by People.

100 million trips. 10 million users. 6 lakh+ drivers.
Live in Bengaluru, Delhi, Chennai, Hyderabad, Kochi, Mysuru & Tumkur.

Namma Yatri is not just another ride app — it’s a people-powered movement.
Built for drivers. Backed by communities. With zero commissions, real transparency, and happy drivers who actually earn.

From office commutes to chai breaks, we get you there.
Fast, fair, and fuss-free.

Why ride with Namma Yatri?

💯 Zero commission – lower fares for you, full earnings for drivers
⚡ Lightning-fast bookings – get the nearest driver in seconds
 🚇 Plan, Track & Book Metro Tickets
🧍 6 lakh+ drivers – autos & cabs you can count on
⭐ Superb service – no extra charges, no nonsense
😊 Happy drivers = low cancellations
💸 Direct payments – UPI or cash, your call
📊 Open data & transparency – see everything at: nammeyatri.in/open

 Feature Highlights

🛡️ SOS button – alert your emergency contacts instantly
📍 Share live tracking with friends & family
🗺️ View accurate metro schedules & plan multimodal journeys
💬 Message your loved ones directly from the app
🛺 Auto & Cab Rentals – affordable rides for errands
🚌 Intercity Bus Booking – book city-to-city buses
🔁 Saved rides & repeat bookings – book faster, ride smarter
⭐ Favourite Driver – rebook drivers you trust
🌐 Multi-language support – English, Kannada, Tamil, Telugu & Hindi

📲 Download Namma Yatri Today
Install. Set location. Book your ride.

🔗 Stay Connected
Instagram: @namma.yatri
Twitter: @nammayatri
YouTube: Namma Yatri
More at: www.nammayatri.in

summary: Auto/Cab Booking App - Low Cancellations, Fast Pickups & Affordable Fares
developerLegalAddress: 3rd Floor, Girija Building, 8th Block, Koramangala, Koramangala Vi Bk, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560095, India
recentChanges:
Addition of a new Payment Mode
HyperUPI option added as a payment mode for experiencing a quicker journey booking using UPI. Simply click on UPI during booking, onboard with a few
clicks and enter UPI PIN for the payment.
